channel.title: Comments on: CoinCalc.com Guesstimates Spare Change

item.title: By: Free Online Coin Calculators Plus Fun Learning Tools For Kids
item.dc:creator: Free Online Coin Calculators Plus Fun Learning Tools For Kids
item.description: […] are mixed opinions on this. For the inside scoop on this particular coin calculator, check out Russell Heimlich’s fun experiment with coins he had lying around as spare […]
item.content:encoded: […] are mixed opinions on this. For the inside scoop on this particular coin calculator, check out Russell Heimlich’s fun experiment with coins he had lying around as spare […]

item.title: By: Darrell
item.dc:creator: Darrell
item.description: Man oh Man, whut will they think of next, a machiney thingamabob that can count yer pocket change, that is ifna ya'll don't have a hole your coverall pockets. Whooee boy. I got sumtin to tell the fellers at the corner store now.
item.content:encoded: Man oh Man, whut will they think of next, a machiney thingamabob that can count yer pocket change, that is ifna ya’ll don’t have a hole your coverall pockets. Whooee boy. I got sumtin to tell the fellers at the corner store now.

item.title: By: Jim
item.dc:creator: Jim
item.description: Wow, that's a very detailed report you have there. Having a machine to count your coins is what I called the smart way of doing things :)
item.content:encoded: Wow, that’s a very detailed report you have there. Having a machine to count your coins is what I called the smart way of doing things

item.title: By: Josh
item.dc:creator: Josh
item.description: you know what I just don't get? what's so bad about slowly counting change? I find it to be enjoyable and relaxing!
item.content:encoded: you know what I just don’t get? what’s so bad about slowly counting change? I find it to be enjoyable and relaxing!

item.title: By: Carroll
item.dc:creator: Carroll
item.description:
Hello Russell,
I want to thank you for doing an in depth test of it and posting the results of each test as it is interesting to see how it works for people. This page has been added as a link from the main coincalc page so other people can also see the results of your tests.
Best Regards, Carroll
item.content:encoded:
Hello Russell,

I want to thank you for doing an in depth test of it and posting the results of each test as it is interesting to see how it works for people. This page has been added as a link from the main coincalc page so other people can also see the results of your tests.

Best Regards,
Carroll
